title: Crustless Cholera
steps: Grate the Potatoes, dice the onions and cut the leeks into small slices
Finely dice the Raclette cheese and put to the side
Put Bacon into a cold pan and fry until it startens to crisp
Add in the oniones and leeks and cook for about 5 minutes while occasionally stirring
Add in Potatoes, Salt, Pepper and other spices and cook until potatoes are almost done
Add in the Beans and cook for an additional 5 minutes
Transfer mixture into a large baking dish, cover with the Raclette cheese and put into the oven on broil until the top gets golden brown
Take it out of the oven, let cool for a couple of minutes and serve
